message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $170. I believe it offers exceptional value at this price, even though it's a bit of a premium.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I'm not sure I'm willing to go all the way up to $170. Can you meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value is quite a bit higher than that to me. How about we settle at $145? This feels like a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $110, but no higher. Can you meet me at that price?
